title: Saudi Arabia issues directives prohibiting broadcast, transmission of prayers in all media during upcoming Ramadan | Nestia
text: KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 23 — Saudi Arabia has issued directives prohibiting the broadcasting or transmission of prayers, including the Tarawih prayer on all types of media outlets during the upcoming Ramadan.The directive was announced by Saudi Arabia’s Ministry of Islamic Affairs, Dawah and Guidance, and was posted on its X account yesterday through its set of instructions and directives to mosques in preparation for the month of Ramadan in March..
